title: Getting Started with Intuos 2015: Using Pen and Touch
description:
Learn how to get started with your new Intuos in this tutorial explaining how to make the most of your tablet's pen and touch features.

Shop Intuos: https://www.wacom.com/en-us/store/intuos?utm_campaign=some-new-intuos&utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=social&utm_content=intuos-landing-page
